contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 7, 2010 D Brass At The Guild (Preston) Contest (Championship Section)
Brass At The Guild (Preston) Contest (Championship Section) 1 Own Choice from a Specified List Brass at the Guild (Preston) brass-at-the-guild-preston-contest-championship
Guild Hall, Preston, Lancashire, England, UK Best Soloist: Euphonium for Bactiguard Wire Brass (Kim Holly Thorpe). 7 bands competed.
July 17, 2010, 11:29 a.m. June 29, 2016, 2:57 p.m.
1 Blackburn and Darwen Band Nick Sheppard A Lowry Sketchbook
2 Pemberton Old Wigan DW Band Mark Bentham Within Blue Empires
3 Bactiguard Wire Brass Paul Andrews Masquerade [Wilby]
4 Freckleton Band Paul Dalton Dances and Arias
5 Blackpool Brass Chris Larder An Epic Symphony
6 Newstead Brass Duncan Beckley Rococo Variations [Gregson]
7 Hade Edge Simon Wood A Moorside Suite
